name: Midnight Fires
description:
Midnight fires is a game by Esteban Jauregui, in midnight fires you are a alien who crash landed on a mysterious forest that's on fire. Your goal is to put that fire out and destroy the evil force that cause it.

Are you a reader and not a gamer? First, why are you on Itch.io. Second, you might be interested in the book "Where the light Ends" now on amazon. A horror novel that takes place on the finch family grounds, huh? What was that? Your already shaking in your boots. Well there's a whole lot more where that came from at https://www.amazon.com/Where-Light-Ends-Hunter-Jauregui/dp/1092752560/ref=sr_1_1...

Contributions: Audio, Hunter Jauregui (huntjj_99),  CynicMusic
